sentences.en: Can make blood abreaction, facial ministry blood stream is expedite.
sentences.cn: 能使瘀血消散.脸部血流畅通.

sentences.en: Expedite offer afraid buyer ready withdraw as others contact him.
sentences.cn: 糨公司正与之接触,请速予报价,否则买主准备撤走.

sentences.en: Expedite to open credit date, to establish with credit database.
sentences.cn: 加快征信数据的开放与信用数据库的建立.

sentences.en: Please do what you can to expedite the building work.
Please expedite your taxiing and proceeding to the hangar direct.
sentences.cn: 请加大滑行速度,直接滑到机库.

sentences.en: Postings on the room accounts are kept up - to - date in order to expedite the check - out procedure.
sentences.cn: 必须将顾客的住房帐目及时登记过帐,以便加快 结帐 手续.

sentences.en: strategies to expedite the decision-making process
The builders promised to expedite the repairs.
The government has been extremely reluctant to expedite investigations that might result in his trial.
sentences.cn: 当局极不情愿推进调查，因为其结果可能会让他接受审判。

sentences.en: The overuse of the work expedite come to mind here.
sentences.cn: 这里又涉及到“尽快”这个指令的滥用问题了.

sentences.en: This will reduce your correspondence with me and expedite your processing.
sentences.cn: 这样将减少你我间的信件往来,加快您审理的速度.

sentences.en: Use of a rotary vacuum evaporator will expedite the concentration steps in the procedure.
sentences.cn: 使用一座旋转真空蒸发器将会加快操作手续的浓缩过程.

sentences.en: We assure you that we shall do our best to expedite shipment.
sentences.cn: 贵方可以放心,我们向贵方保证我们会竭尽全力地使发货尽可能地满足贵方的要求.

sentences.en: We must expedite the construction of the Southwest area of our country.
sentences.cn: 我们要加快三线地区的建设进度.

sentences.en: We tried to help you expedite your plans.
sentences.cn: 我们试图帮你加快你的计划。

sentences.en: We will expedite shipment as much as possible.
sentences.cn: 我们将尽可能加速装运.

trans.tran_en: If you expedite something, you cause it to be done more quickly
